name: Birthday
info: A chocolate fruity combination for added indulgence. Our unique recipe results in a lighter density cake, just right to be encased in freshly whipped cream and grated chocolate. This light and fluffy sponge will melt in your mouth and the icing flowers add a delightful feminine flair.

name: Birthday
info: A chocolate fruity combination for added indulgence. Our unique recipe results in a lighter density cake, just right to be encased in freshly whipped cream and grated chocolate. This light and fluffy sponge will melt in your mouth and the icing flowers add a delightful feminine flair.

name: Birthday
info: Impress your loved ones with Little Sweet exclusive selection of cakes in a range of delicious flavours. Make someone's birthday extra special with one of these incredibly delicious and crowd-pleasing birthday cakes.

name: Birthday
info: Impress your loved ones with Little Sweet exclusive selection of cakes in a range of delicious flavours. Make someone's birthday extra special with one of these incredibly delicious and crowd-pleasing birthday cakes.

name: Anniversary
info: Romantic and classic cakes to celebrate your wedding anniversary, whether it's your silver, golden, ruby, emerald or diamond anniversary! They’re made with high-quality ingredients to deliver a tantalizing taste experience but we also aim to reduce the sugar and fat content of our cakes without interfering with their signature taste.

name: Wedding
info: Say 'I do!' to fresh American home baking for your big day with our special range of wedding cakes. We offer the most beautiful no fuss handmade buttercream wedding cakes in London.Our range of spectacular centrepiece creations for your special day. Choose from one of our gorgeous standard cakes, or contact us for details of our bespoke service.

name: Mermaid
info: This rippled mermaid buttercream cake is decorated with golden shells, pastel sea horses, pearlescent meringue kisses and topped with a blue mermaid tail. Delectable mermaid cakes sure to tickle your taste buds for any occasion! Planning a mermaid party? The party is not complete without a mermaid cake!

name: Dragon
info: Cakes by Little Sweet in amazing children's birthday cakes and can create a tasty centerpiece to your child's special day based on any idea or theme.The cakes are delivered fresh to your door in perfect condition for that special day.

name: Cat
info: If you're a crazy cat lover, then these fifteen cutesy cat cakes are going to be right up your alley! Is there anything cuter than a kitten made of sugar and delicious cream?

name: Dragon Egg
info: Cakes by Little Sweet in amazing children's birthday cakes and can create a tasty centerpiece to your child's special day based on any idea or theme.The cakes are delivered fresh to your door in perfect condition for that special day.

name: Minion
info: Invite the Minions from Despicable Me to your child's birthday party!Sponge filled with raspberry jam and sweet filling, covered with soft icing and edible decorations.what a better way to put a smile on your little ones face!

name: Rocket
info: Space Rocket Cake Chocolate Sponge birthday cakes, for smaller parties and great value, delivered all over London by Little Sweet. Let's give it a go!

name: Spider Man
info: Did someone say Spiderman? This spectacular Spiderman cake will blow any superhero fan away. Guaranteed to impress, it's the perfect birthday cake!The cakes are delivered fresh to your door in perfect condition for that special day.

name: Lego
info: Are you planning your child's next birthday party? Does your child LOVE LEGO? Then this LEGO Cake would be a hit at any LEGO themed party!The cakes are delivered fresh to your door in perfect condition for that special day.

name: Unicorn
info: Birthday is a special day for everyone, and a perfect cake will seal the deal. Fantasy fictions create some of the best birthday cake ideas. Surprise your loved one with our adorable and yummmy Unicorn cake.

name: Chocolate sponge
info: The perfect chocolate cake, with plenty of dark chocolate flavor and a light and silky texture.Rich chocolate mousse on a chocolate sponge base and crowned with a luxurious cream.

name: Fruit cheesecake
info: Looking to have a delicious cheesecake? Try one of our cheesecakes and discover why the cheesecake is one of the most popular desserts in the world.

name: Biscuit CheeseCake
info: Indulge in a rich creamy cheesecake filled with chocolatey biscuit pieces.Decadently rich, yet not as dense as some, our own-recipe with gorgeous ganache is the ultimate crowd pleaser.The cakes are delivered fresh to your door in perfect condition.

name: Choco CheeseCake
info: A luscious concoction comprising three layers of chocolate sponge filled with chocolate cream and topped with grated dark chocolate shavings.

name: Tiramisu
info: Layers of melt-in-your mouth sponge, lashings of cream, glossy icing and a cherry on the top. Perfection.

name: Blueberry CheeseCake
info: Home crafted cheesecakes, freshly made using only the finest ingredients. We put our hearts into everything to create cheesecake heaven for our customers.

name: Mango CheeseCake
info: When you're looking for the smoothest, most scrumptious cheesecake, the exotic flavor of this mango cheesecake is hard to beat. Made with fresh, delicious mangoes,it is a perfect dessert to share with family and friends this holiday season.

name: Lemon CheeseCake
info: Need a simple zingy dessert? A light layer of of graham cracker crumbs adds a bit of crunch to the top of this luscious lemon cheesecake is the perfect choice.

name: Japan CheeseCake
info: Light and fluffy, Japanese Cheesecake is a delicious gift for a real cheesecake lover. It’s a melt-in-your-mouth combination of creamy cheesecake and airy soufflé. A second (or more) serving is a guarantee!

name: Pastry 1
info: Our Cottage Pie is a firm favourite with the locals, but then again, so are all our other tasty varieties.

name: Pastry 2
info: Come in and see what's hot! Our extensive range of meal-size pies are available ready to enjoy or cold in take-home packs.

name: Pastry 3
info: A delicious blend of fresh vegetables and meat, our pasties are a complete meal in themselves. Perfect for lunch on the run.
